function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased garden usage associated with better health outcomes","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to private outdoor space for older adults","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of vitamin d deficiency among older scottish adults due to decreased sunlight exposure","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with the potential spread of contagious diseases in domestic gardens","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Issues of lockdown preventing in-person sessions","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants sharing photos from their homes may not follow proper hygiene and safety measures, increasing the risk of contagious disease propagation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person data collection and analysis may expose researchers and participants to contagious diseases","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of data analysis tools and software may lead to errors in interpreting health-related data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases through handling physical photographs and materials","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact during group analysis and categorization of photographs may lead to disease transmission","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear protocols for handling and coding of physical materials may increase the risk of cross-contamination","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection during a period of lockdown may introduce bias based on the participants’ circumstances and responses","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in the database, stemming from misunderstandings, invalid responses, or typo errors, may compromise the accuracy of the analysis","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on a specific software version stata software version 14","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of stata software for data analysis","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large sample size for quantitative questionnaire","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Six variables related to household and dwelling characteristics","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor noise insulation","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation due to hvac system usage","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Altered use and occupation habits leading to potential clustering of people","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in energy consumption patterns could lead to increased risk of indoor air pollution and respiratory diseases due to higher usage of household appliances","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of domestic hot water systems and household appliances can lead to a higher demand for water and energy, putting a strain on resources and increasing the risk of utility shortages","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may be spread in the households through close contact and shared living spaces","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High participation and interaction in the study may lead to increased risk of disease transmission among participants","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases during the study","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High number of participants in close proximity","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large volume of data and photographs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of nvivo software for generating word clouds may lead to misinterpretation of data or bias in the results","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling a large volume of tags may result in oversight or misclassification of important terms","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of categorization of infectious diseases","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and spatial design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban dwellings with multiple family members","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of space and resources for leisure and sports activities","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly lit and uncomfortable spaces","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of organization in storage rooms and spaces","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of use of individual refrigeration equipment despite its availability increases the risk of discomfort and potential health issues in high temperatures","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased hot water usage in households leading to higher risk of waterborne diseases transmission","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased usage of household appliances involving water consumption leading to potential waterborne diseases transmission","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher energy usage in households leading to potential indoor air pollution and respiratory health risks","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative spatial perception and mental health effects due to poor housing quality","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of spatial flexibility and independent supplies in dwellings","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor environmental quality and associated health risks","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of stable access to resources for telework and daily living","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient thermal installations and power appliances leading to increased indoor energy consumption","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate storage and space for domestic tasks leading to overcrowding and lack of essential space","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High costs of expanding the area of land and sea under protection","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of funding security for pcas","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased tourism can lead to the spread of contagious diseases in protected conservation areas pcas","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for crowded or congested tourist attractions leading to increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay or reluctance to update entrance and other fees for protected conservation areas pcas leading to financial challenges","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"}]}
